original_text: Jeroboam did not recover his power in the days of Abijah. And the Lord struck him down, and he died.
korean_text: 아비야 때에 여로보암이 다시 강성하지 못하고 여호와의 치심을 입어 죽었고

sentences.original_text: Jeroboam did not recover his power in the days of Abijah.
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보��은 아비야 때에 그의 권세를 회복하지 못했다.

sentences.original_text: And the Lord struck him down
